event.title: 1669 the "official" discovery of the Shenandoah Valley was credited

data.event: In 1669 the "official" discovery of the Shenandoah Valley was credited to John Lederer and John Catlett at the present day site of Linden.
The Linden Methodist Church was built in 1842 and numerous buildings still exist dating from the 19th century.
In November 1954, tragedy struck the Linden church.
